thread.title: The Best of Women's Spring Style: Bold Colors and Mismatched Prints - WSJ.com

author: Photography Clara Balzary
title: The Best of Women's Spring Style: Bold Colors and Mismatched Prints - WSJ.com

organizations.name: charlotte collet scroll high life patch

text: The Best of Women's Spring Style: Bold Colors and Mismatched Prints Blue skies and sunshine call for having some fun with your wardrobe. Photography by Clara Balzary, Styling by Charlotte Collet Scroll HIGH LIFE Patch together a new take on head-to-toe dressing. Calvin Klein 205W39NYC shirt, $890, and pants, $990, Calvin Klein, 654 Madison Avenue, New York. Photography by Clara Balzary, Styling by Charlotte Collet HOT TROPICS Cover up with luau-ready florals. Gucci jacket, $3,980, and swimsuit, $490, select Gucci stores nationwide, Prada necklace, (worn as bracelet) price upon request, select Prada boutiques, Lola Hats hat, $263, matchesfashion​.com. Photography by Clara Balzary, Styling by Charlotte Collet MUSCLE BEACH Take a strong approach with bright shorts. Bottega Veneta shirt, $1,350, 800-845-6790, Prada shorts, $1,030, select Prada boutiques. Photography by Clara Balzary, Styling by Charlotte Collet ANIMAL PLANET Roam free in exotic and equine prints. Chloé shirt, $1,150, and pants, $1,495, chloe​.com, Polo Ralph Lauren swim top, $56, Polo Ralph Lauren stores, Michael Kors Collection sandals, price upon request, select Michael Kors stores, Prada necklace, price upon request, select Prada boutiques. Photography by Clara Balzary, Styling by Charlotte Collet GARDEN VARIETY Sweet sleepwear is ideal for lazy mornings. Max Mara robe, $2,290, Max Mara, 813 Madison Avenue, New York, The Elder Statesman pajama top, $576, elder-statesman​.com. Photography by Clara Balzary, Styling by Charlotte Collet HANG LOOSE Press pause on buttoned-up looks. Michael Kors Collection shirt, > $795, and shorts, $850, select Michael Kors stores, Max Mara swim top, $130, Max Mara, 2186 Kalakaua Avenue, Honolulu, Prada necklace, price upon request, select Prada boutiques, Albertus Swanepoel hat, $160, albertusswanepoel​.com. Photography by Clara Balzary, Styling by Charlotte Collet TRUE STRIPES Khaki doesn’t need to be boring. Fendi top, $1,100, and shorts, $550, fendi​.com, Dries Van Noten briefs, $365, barneys​.com, and Prada necklace, price upon request, select Prada boutiques. Photography by Clara Balzary, Styling by Charlotte Collet CHECK OUT Soak up some heat in island style. Burberry shirt, $490, and pants, $790, us.burberry​.com, Lola Hats hat, $163, matchesfashion​.com, Prada necklace (worn as bracelet), price upon request, select Prada boutiques. Photography by Clara Balzary, Styling by Charlotte Collet GRASS ROOTS A knotted jumpsuit has casual ease. Etro shirt, $770, etro​.com, Matteau swim top, $120, matteau-swim​.com, Ralph Lauren Collection jumpsuit, $1,890, select Ralph Lauren stores, and Michael Kors Collection sandals, price upon request, select Michael Kors stores. Model, Sophia Ahrens at DNA Model Management; hair, Ramsell Martinez; makeup, John McKay. Photography by Clara Balzary, Styling by Charlotte Collet Advertisement
